name: GoldStableCoin (24K)
description: GoldStableCoin (24K) is a revolutionary stablecoin designed to maintain its value in direct correlation with the spot price of gold per gram. Each 24K token is backed by real gold, making it a secure and stable digital asset. The 24K token is pegged 1:1 to the current market price of gold, ensuring that as the value of gold fluctuates, the value of 24K tokens adjusts accordingly.
